title: Game-based Instructional Design for Enhancing Social Problem-Solving Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Awareness of Social Issues and Digital Tool Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Participatory learning through smartphone-based game play and prototype design

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social problem scenarios within games and derive at least three solution strategies.
Learners can evaluate game playability (goal-task-feedback connectivity) at over 80% accuracy based on heuristic evaluation criteria.
Learners can propose at least two game improvement plans through storyboard-based prototype design.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
